page.title: 04BUILDINGS WYDDIAL
page.content: 1.Wyddial Hall.A two_storeyed country house begun early 16th century. Remodelled to present appearance 1733.Further alterations & additions 1780 & mid_19th century. 2.The Coach House.Wyddial Hall 18th century stable and coach_house converted to a house in the 1970's. 3.Wyddial Parva.House converted from Hall out_buildings in the 1970's. 4.Wyddial Bury Farm.Mainly 16th century with late 17th century southern extension and some 19th century additions.Ornamental farm buildings added 1867. 5.Thatched Cottage,Mole Lane.16th century.Divided in 19th century, south part was used as a shop.Restored 1983. 6.Wyddial Bury Cottage.17th century. 7.The Old Rectory.Early 19th century now a private house. 8.Beauchamps.A moated farmhouse.1653.
